data.title: Parker Meggitt Defense Systems Division
data.meta_description: Parker Meggitt Defense Systems Division excels in cutting-edge technology, providing top-tier solutions such as thermal management systems, aerospace pumps and fans, ammunition handling systems, weapon scoring, and towed targets. Explore our expertise for comprehensive defense capabilities.
data.text:
Thermal management systems, aerospace fans and aerospace pumps for extreme environments and temperatures. Our rugged, affordable designs provide complete cooling solutions.

Our weapon scoring systems for air, land and sea training, can identify and locate projectiles of any size with extreme accuracy. Projectile tracking is a Meggitt specialty.

Our aerial towed and glide target systems set the industry benchmark for performance, cost effectiveness, and reliability. Our products are used to test the best of air defenses.

Even in the most extreme environments, our industry-leading accelerometers, dynamic pressure transducers, and extremely high temperature PE accelerometers operate flawlessly while delivering incredibly precise measurements.
